mapper.select: select DISTINCT hr.pic_room_url, ho.h_name, ty.room_price, ho.h_address, ho.h_phonenum, ho.h_no from hotel ho inner join hotel_room hr on ho.h_no = hr.h_no join type ty on ty.room_type = hr.room_type where ho.h_no = #{h_no} and ty.h_no = #{h_no} and hr.room_type = #{room_type}
mapper.insert: insert into hotel_order (order_num, h_no, start_day, end_day, order_price, order_name, userNo, p_condition, order_date, user_phonenumber,room_type) values(hotel_order_order_seq.nextval, #{h_no}, #{start_day}, #{end_day}, #{order_price}, #{order_name}, #{userNo}, #{p_condition}, sysdate, #{user_phonenumber}, #{room_type} )
mapper.select: select userNo from users where id = #{id}
